channel.title: S508 camera field of view?
channel.description: hello. ive been following this tutorial: [code]http://www.google.org/runescape-development/rs-503-client-server/tutorials/86785-503-using-fullscreen-interface.html[/code]i just want to know how to change the field of view to maybe something more suitable like 70 degrees and how to make the camera elevate less when panning above the player. [img]http://oi54.tinypic.com/2ewl4yh.jpg[/img] [img]http://oi51.tinypic.com/2ym95xd.jpg[/img] pictures are pretty big. sorry about that. also- is there any documentation for the client? if anybody could reply that would be great.

item.title: S508 camera field of view?
item.dc:creator: @rentreg rentreg
item.description:
@rentreg wrote:

hello. ive been following this tutorial:

http://www.google.org/runescape-development/rs-503-client-server/tutorials/86785-503-using-fullscreen-interface.htmli just want to know how to change the field of view to maybe something more suitable like 70 degrees and how to make the camera elevate less when panning above the player.

2ewl4yh.jpg1600×900

2ym95xd.jpg1600×900

pictures are pretty big. sorry about that.
also- is there any documentation for the client?
if anybody could reply that would be great.
